name: SMASHBREAK
description:
Use paddles on either side of the screen to deflect balls and break the blocks in the middle. Collect power-ups and use your SMASH ability to send the ball flying and break multiple blocks at once. Two-player mode lets two people play on a single PS3™ system or PSP® system to play head to head.

Download SMASHBREAK™ today!

Playable on PS3™ and PSP® systems.



"PlayStation" and the "PS" Family logo are registered trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and this item's use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all of these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
